binding:binding.name: Lwm2m Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for Lwm2m.
binding:binding.author: David Graeff

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Lwm2m Server Port
parameter.description: Usually you don't want to change the IANA assigned UDP port for CoAP (so for LWM2M)

parameter.name: port_secure
parameter.label: Lwm2m Server Port (secure)
parameter.description: Usually you don't want to change the IANA assigned secure UDP port with DTLS for CoAP (so for LWM2M)

parameter.name: secure_method
parameter.label: Use encryption?
parameter.description: Use DTLS for encryption or transfer without encryption

parameter.name: secure_public_key
parameter.label: (Private) Secure Key
parameter.description: The key used for DTLS. This is the private part if elliptic curves are used.

parameter.name: secure_point_x
parameter.label: Elliptic curve, x coordinate
parameter.description: In Hexadecimal. Only used if elliptic curves are used.

parameter.name: secure_point_y
parameter.label: Elliptic curve, y coordinate
parameter.description: In Hexadecimal. Only used if elliptic curves are used.
